name: hayasa blend #1
description:
This Coffee Blend is for those who enjoy Middle Eastern Coffee. Hayasa Blend #1 is a blend of Cameroonian, Brazilian, Timorese coffees, roasted darker on the roast spectrum.  This coffee gives strong chocolate notes, while maintaining a bright sweetness. It is heavy-bodied, layered with cocoa, and has a nice banana/chocolate aftertaste.  This is great coffee to serve your guests whether it's a visit from grandma or friends over for hookah and Kebob.
*This coffee is pre-ground at the Finest setting possible (Finer than Espresso) and is specially designed for stove top coffee makers (Ibriks).
